aka: The Day My Friend Didn't Come to Football

cast.name: Elias Amati Aagesen Elias Amati Aagesen
贾利宛·阿玛德 Jarivan Ahmad

writer.name: 贾利宛·阿玛德 Jarivan Ahmad

this_title: Den dag min ven ikke kom til fodbold
trans_title: The Day My Friend Didn't Come to Football
introduction: When Noah is going to football training, he waits in vain for his best friend Theis. When he hears that Theis is thrown out of the team, he tries in vain to contact him. No one apparently takes his concerns for the friend seriously, and Noah himself must take action if he wants to find him.
chinese_title: Den dag min ven ikke kom til fodbold
